attributes.action: Ban E Cigarettes and Vaping from indoor public places .
attributes.additional_details:
Significant levels of chromium, manganese, nickel and lead were found in about half of the samples tested by researchers.
Ashley May
Published 11:24 AM ET Fri, 23 Feb 2018  Updated 12:10 PM ET Fri, 23 Feb 2018
attributes.background: Many Pubs and night clubs allow this practise also hotels even when there are children present .
